SEARCH
Package model

Class FileOperationsImpl

java.lang.Object
model.FileOperationsImpl
All Implemented Interfaces:
FileOperations
public class FileOperationsImpl extends Object implements FileOperations
This class has all the methods for reading from and writing to a file. Currently, we are supporting xml and json format only but all the file operations will be done here.

    • writeToFile

      public void writeToFile(String fileName, String portfolioName, Map<String,Integer> stocks) throws IllegalArgumentException
      Description copied from interface: FileOperations
      This function writes the inflexible portfolio to xml file which can be loaded later.
      Specified by:
      writeToFile in interface FileOperations
      Parameters:
      fileName - the name of file in which you want to store
      portfolioName - the name of portfolios in your file
      stocks - The Map consists of ticker and quantity of stocks in your portfolio
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - when there is some error in writing to the file.

    • writeToJson

      public void writeToJson(String fileName, String portfolioName, List<Stocks> stocks) throws IllegalArgumentException
      Description copied from interface: FileOperations
      This function writes the flexible portfolio to a json file which can be loaded later.
      Specified by:
      writeToJson in interface FileOperations
      Parameters:
      fileName - the name of file in which you want to store
      portfolioName - the name of portfolios in your file
      stocks - the list of stocks consisting the ticker, quantity, date and cost basis of stocks.
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - when there is some error in writing to the file.

    • editJson

      public void editJson(String fileName, String portfolioName, List<Stocks> stocks) throws IllegalArgumentException
      Description copied from interface: FileOperations
      This function is used to read a json file and update it while buying and selling stocks.
      Specified by:
      editJson in interface FileOperations
      Parameters:
      fileName - the name of file to be edited.
      portfolioName - the name of portfolio where the transaction occurs
      stocks - the list of stocks consisting ticker, quantity, date and cost basis.
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if the file does not exist or there is error in writing to file.

      Parameters:
      fName - the file name/path with extension to be read
